name: trycatch
value: try { try_statements } catch (exception_var) { catch_statements } finally { finally_statements }

name: forloop
value: for (let i = 0; i < 9; i++) { str = str + i; }

name: switch
value: switch(expression) { case x: /*code block break*/; case y: /*code block break*/ break; default: /*code block break*/ }

name: forof
value: for (variable of iterable) { // code block to be executed }
